welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Woodridge, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport houses all major airlines and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments, providing efficient and secure handling for businesses.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all travelers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all cargo and freight flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Midway Airport houses all domestic flights and is divided into three concourses: A, B, and C.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Midway Airport serves international flights from select airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and follow the prompts to access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dupage County Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Kankakee Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Greater Kankakee Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
